Trade/Device Name(s): Rapidan Optima Early One Step hCG Urine Pregnancy Test
Toyo One Step hCG Urine Pregnancy Test
Submitter Information: Turklab Tibbi Malzemeler San. ve Tic. A.S.
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Rapidan Optima Early and Toyo One Step hCG Urine Pregnancy Tests using chromatographic immunoassay to qualitatively detect hCG in urine for pregnancy detection.
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro diagnostic tests for qualitative detection of hCG in human urine to aid in pregnancy detection; Rapidan Optima Early for OTC use (cut-off 20 IU/L); Toyo for OTC and professional/lab use (cut-off 25 IU/L), available in cassette and strip formats.
